item.title: If you see me, "LocalItemsFile" is enabled!
item.subtitle: Warning
item.description:
To disable, set "EnableLocalItemsFile = false" in AppSettings.cs
By the way, I am html, click me and I'll take you to Bing

item.title: Shi Tzu
item.subtitle: small
item.description: A shih tzu is a toy dog breed weighing 5â€“7.25 kilograms with long silky hair. The breed originated in China. Shih Tzu were officially recognized by the American Kennel Club in 1969. The name is both singular and plural.
